subject: Is there a way to raise an error and not a fail?
msgSnippet: I have come across a situation that the data has a problem.  I was trying to come up with a way to have the test pass but still raise an error.  The other
messageBody:
I have come across a situation that the data has a problem. I was
trying to come up with a way to have the test pass but still raise an
error. The other option is to some how get it to appear in the
test-reports.

Thanks
Jeff
